subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Even though the Yankees took an 11-run lead, the bullpen was so shaky that Manager Joe Girardi felt compelled to use Dellin Betances and Andrew Miller to finish off the game.
snippet: Even though the Yankees took an 11-run lead, the bullpen was so shaky that Manager Joe Girardi felt compelled to use Dellin Betances and Andrew Miller to finish off the game.
